page.title: 13Memorial Hall-Hest Bank.
page.content: The Memorial Hall is nearly in the middle of Slyne-With-Hest.Events happen here for all ages.For the younger generation there is a Play School on weekday mornings.The Hest Bank Badminton club meet at the Memorial Hall during the winter months.There are dances and whist drives at the Memorial Hall for the older people of Slyne with Hest,and each month an over 60's club meets here.Each Sunday there is a service at the Memorial hall for the Roman Catholic residents of Slyne with Hest.There is a small library in the Memorial Hall serving the village of Slyne with Hest.There is a plaque in the entrance of the Memorial hall in memory of those people of Slyne with Hest who served in the 1st and 2nd World Wars.
